entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
